phrases: D- dammit!
You say the other two Saiyans are even stronger!?
W- what is going on here?
It is too late for you now, even if you do realize how terrible we Saiyans are!
You have got us there.
I wish we had not heard that.
There is only one thing
that fools who defy me without heeding the warnings I so graciously offered get...
You must be pretty excited, huh, Son Goku?
Sorry, but this time, I are not all that excited.
I am so scared, I am trembling!
Of course you are!
However, that terror will turn to hopelessness very soon.
Never mind me, where is my son!?
Where have you hidden him!?
I have not hidden him.
I just locked him up because he was bawling so loudly.
There is a hole behind you, right?
He is in there.
In there, huh?
Gohan...
Father!
Save me, Father!
Hold on, Gohan!
Daddy's going to come rescue you right away!
Do not be ridiculous!
There is no way you can save him!
Not if you guys die first!
All right, let us do it!
That is all we can do!
Behind me!
Yikes!
Where did you go!?
I am right here.
Even with both of you coming at me,
this is not even worth wasting my breath on!
Damn...
Are you okay, Piccolo?
R- relax.
I can still manage to fight with o- only one arm.
It looks like your deaths are finally drawing near, huh!?
I- I wonder if Goku is doing okay.
For some reason, I have this strange, uneasy feeling in my chest.
I have never felt anything like this before.
I hope nothing bad is happening.
Listen, teamed up with Piccolo, he is not going to be done in so easily.
That is all the more reason to be concerned!
What if Piccolo double-crosses Goku,
and teams up with that Raditz guy?
If those two are done in, then there is nothing left that we can do.
It will be the end of everything!
Goku...
What is the matter?
Are you finished already?
Where did all that gusto you had earlier go?
Hey, Son Goku, do you have any new reserve techniques?
Sorry, cannot say I do.
Sheesh, ease up, will you?
And here I have been training seriously, developing something new.
What are you two whispering about?
Whatever strategy you devise, it will not work!
It would be easier on you if you would just keel over right away.
Are you for real?
You have got yourself a new technique up your sleeve?
Yeah.
Can you do it with only one arm?
Yeah, that part's okay.
But this technique takes quite a bit of time
in order to build up enough Ki.
While I am doing that, you fight him by yourself, and draw his attention.
Got it!
Will this technique work against him?
Probably.
If this does not work, then there is no other way to defeat him.
I was saving this in order to kill you.
And instead, you might end up saving me with it, huh?
If I am able to defeat him with this, then your turn is next.
Is that right?
This is no time to be laughing, you know.
They are laughing...
So they are changing their posture, are they?
All right, I am looking forward to this!
Now then, let us see about keeping him in check!
Hang in there as best you can!
Makankosappo!!
So, you have finally resigned yourself?
You are a persistent one!
Ka...
me...
I- impossible!
His battle power is rising!
Battle power 924... 925!
ha...
He is able to concentrate his battle power into one point and raise it up!?
me...
T- this one's battle power is now 1020!
YOU- unbelievable!
It is still going up!
HA!!
You have got a lot of nerve!
He caught it!
W- what kind of guy is this?
This time, I will present you with one!
Die!
You are going to be the one who dies!
Battle power 1330!?
A- all of his battle power is gathered into just his fingertip!
Dammit!
These guys can manipulate their powers at will!
Try taking this on!
Makankosappo!!
H- he avoided it!
W- what kind of bastard is he, with such speed?
You pierced through this armor quite easily.
That is quite a technique.
If I had taken that head-on, I would have been out!
That does not mean anything if I do not hit you!
To think that you would inflict injury upon me!
You are going to pay for this!
I am through playing around!
W- we have had it now!
I will obliterate you in an instant!
Rot in hell!!
You got careless, did not you!?
I have got your tail!
Why, you... when did you get behind me!?
Piccolo!
Now!
Do that thing one more time!
Y- you got it!
Nicely done, Goku!
Keep a firm grip on that tail!
I am limited to only being able to use this technique one more time.
K- Kakarrot!
Are you planning to kill your one and only brother!?
Shut up!
I told you, any guy as cruel as you are are not any brother of mine!
As someone who was going to kill my son,
do not you go saying that self-serving junk!
I- I will stop!
I have had a change of heart!
I will leave this planet without making any more trouble!
Do not be fooled, Son Goku!
There is no truth in what he is saying!
There is no way he would do that!
P- please!
Believe me, my younger brother!
Truly, I have done some cruel things up to now!
To you, as well...
But I will keep my promise, no matter what!
Y- you really mean it?
I- I really do!
N- No!!
Do not let go of his tail!
That is his tactic!
I am begging you, Kakarrot!
B- believe me!
Son Goku!
Y- you miserable idiot!
Indeed!
Fools such as yourself are quite uncommon!
To think that you would be so completely taken in!
Just as I thought, there is no way that you could be a warrior!
T- that was dirty!
But I am not like you.
I am a first-rate warrior!
I have absolutely no hesitations about killing you, even if you are my brother!
Shall I provide you with a sample?
Father...
There you go, there you go!
Suffer even more!
Your death is near!
What is the matter?
Are not you going to come at me?
Try doing that thing you did earlier!
H- he will just dodge it again like this!
Father...
That Gohan!
I told him that once he gets his tests back,
he should show them to me.
Still, you have done very well, Gohan.
Sure enough, it is worth it for him to be studyin' every day for eight hours.
Once I show this to Goku, I am sure he will say the same thing.
I sure wish Goku and Gohan would both get back soon.
Scream some more!
Cry out!
Your turn comes next!
Get yourself ready!
Well now, shall I finally put you out of your misery?
Die, Kakarrot!!
W- what?
What!?
With his father in a great pinch, Son Gohan instinctively springs forth!
Though his body may be small, his anger is something fierce!
